channel.title: Constellation of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the constellation of the day.

item.title: Constellation Records (Canada)
item.description: Constellation Records is a Canadian independent record label based in Montreal, Quebec. It has released albums by many post-rock bands, including Godspeed You! Black Emperor, Thee Silver Mt. Zion Memorial Orchestra & Tra-La-La Band and Do Make Say Think.
